channel.title: CSOH - Cloud Security News
channel.description: Latest cloud security news curated by Cloud Security Office Hours. Covers AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes vulnerabilities, breaches, and more.

item.title: Supply Chain Attack Embeds Malware in Android Devices
item.description: Keenadu downloads payloads that hijack browser searches, commit ad fraud, and execute other actions without user knowledge.

item.title: Flaws in popular VSCode extensions expose developers to attacks

item.title: RMM Abuse Explodes as Hackers Ditch Malware
item.description: Remote monitoring and management (RMM) software offers hackers multiple benefits, including stealth, persistence, and operational efficiency.

item.title: ClickFix Attacks Abuses DNS Lookup Command to Deliver ModeloRAT
item.description: ClickFix campaigns have adapted to the latest defenses with a new technique to trick users into infecting their own machines with malware.
